    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnsiColor
    Represents an ANSI color with both foreground and background escape codes.
    AnsiStyle
    Enumeration of common ANSI text styles.
    BoxStyle
    Represents a visual box style using Unicode or ASCII characters.
    Choice<T>
    Represents a selectable option in a prompt.
    ConsoleBuilder
    Provides a fluent API for building styled console output.
    ConsoleConfig
    Provides global configuration defaults for the SimpleTerminal library.
    Prompt
    Provides interactive console prompts for user input.
    ValidationException
    Thrown to indicate that a validation check has failed.
